branding.motto: This is our time, and these are our spaces. Share a moment.

validations.password: Password must contain letter(s), number(s), and special character(s)
validations.mobilePhoneNumber: Input must be a valid, international mobile number beginning with '+'

loginForm.backendErrorMessage: Connection error. Please try again later.
loginForm.tooManyRequests: Too many login attempts, please try again later.

messagingContainer.welcome: This is the start of a new conversation...

text.signupForRewards: Continue signup to earn rewards for you and {userName}!

changePassword.failedMessage: An error occurred while trying to reset your password.
changePassword.failedMessageUserNotFound: No user found. Logout and try again.
changePassword.failedMessageIncorrectPassword: The password you entered is incorrect.

emailVerification.failedMessage: Failed to verify your e-mail. Invalid verification code.
emailVerification.failedMessageExpired: Failed to verify your e-mail. Verification code has expired.
emailVerification.failedMessageAlreadyVerified: Your e-mail is already verified. Log in to continue.
emailVerification.failedMessageVerificationResent: A new verification code has been sent to {email}.
emailVerification.failedMessageUserNotFound: No user found. Try a different e-mail or create an account to continue.
emailVerification.successVerifiedMessage: Your account has been verified. Log in to continue.

resetPassword.failedMessage: An error occurred while trying to reset your password.
resetPassword.failedMessageUserNotFound: No user found. Try a different e-mail or create an account to continue.
resetPassword.instructions: Enter your account e-mail to reset your password.
resetPassword.successMessage: Check your e-mail for a link to reset your password

home.welcome: The Nearby Event Stream & Rewards App
home.info: Therr is a space to share content at various geo-locations and connect with other users while traveling the globe or even just walking around your local community.
home.info2: Food bloggers, restaurant influencers, travel influencers, and any local influencer can use Therr app to request to partner and collaborate with local businesses.
home.info3: Install the mobile app for the best experience.

placeholders.title: A catchy title...
placeholders.subtitle: An optional subtitle
placeholders.description: A brief description of the chat...

createForum.noForumsMessage: No chats are currently active. Click 'Create Hosted Chat' to start a new one.

createProfile.phoneNumberAlreadyInUseError: Phone number is already in use for this account type
createProfile.invalidCode: Code is invalid or expired. Try again or resend.
createProfile.info: We are dedicated to preventing fake users, so Multi-Factor Auth is a must. Requiring an e-mail and phone # along with geo-tag post requirements drastically limits the potential for fake users.

register.registerSuccess: Registration success! Check your e-mail for verification.
register.passwordRequirements1: Contains a mixture of letters and numbers

userProfile.connectionSent: You connection request is on the way!
userProfile.requestRecommendation: Send a request to make connections and build a network

underConstruction.info: You must be looking for the mobile app! Find it below. For now, the desktop app only supports basic features like updating your password or account details.
